pages.text:
[TO BE PUBLISHED IN THE GAZETTE OF INDIA, EXTRAORDINARY, PART II,
SECTION 3, SUB-SECTION (i)]
Government of India
Ministry of Finance
(Department of Revenue)
New Delhi, the 30th June, 2017
Corrigendum
G.S.R. (E).- In the notification of the Government of India, in the Ministry of Finance
(Department of Revenue), No.4/2017-Integrated Tax (Rate), dated the 28th June, 2017
published at page 156 of the Gazette of India, Extraordinary, Part II, Section 3, Sub-section
(i), vide number G.S.R. 669(E), dated the 28th June, 2017, in line 16, for “intra-state” read
“inter-state”.
[F. No. 354/117/2017-TRU]
(Mohit Tewari)
Under Secretary to the Government of India
